title: Norway investigates former PM Jagland over alleged Epstein links
summary_full: Police say Thorbjørn Jagland is suspected of "aggravated corruption", requesting for his immunity to be revoked.
summary_public: Police say Thorbjørn Jagland is suspected of "aggravated corruption", requesting for his immunity to be revoked.
